channel.title: Casual RP Podcast
channel.description: A Boy, Guard, Thief and Giant are caught between the wild cries of the jungle and the hammers of industry… this is Casual RP. A 5th edition Dungeons and Dragons Actual Play Podcast
channel.itunes:author: Redhead Web
channel.itunes:summary: Twice-weekly actual play DnD podcast done by complete amateurs. We have a gritty and realistic medieval setting to explore where the plot and quests are shaped by the players and listeners.
channel.itunes:subtitle: A Boy, Guard, Thief and Giant are caught between the wild cries of the jungle and the hammers of industry… this is Casual RP. A 5th edition Dungeons and Dragons Actual Play Podcast

item.title: Chapter 2 Ep. 5 | Cassia's Announcement
item.description: The party gathers some political gossipy tidbits, Cor’s long awaited plan is finally put into action, Ash gets into a fight with a suitor of Leila’s, Leila gets even more practiced at averting her eyes, Ser Selwyn tries to keep the party from getting too rowdy (with little success) while they prepare for their quest into the swamp to search for lost friends and seek out the old hag.
item.itunes:summary: The party gathers some political gossipy tidbits, Cor’s long awaited plan is finally put into action, Ash gets into a fight with a suitor of Leila’s, Leila gets even more practiced at averting her eyes, Ser Selwyn tries to keep the party from getting too rowdy (with little success) while they prepare for their quest into the swamp to search for lost friends and seek out the old hag.

item.title: Chapter 2 Ep. 4 | Leila's Betrothal
item.description: After visiting Leila’s father, a bleeding and beaten Stephanos enters the bar. Ser Selwyn, Ash and Cor go to the blacksmith to maintain their gear while Leyla slips off into the woods with Stephanos to tell him one of her deepest secrets.
item.itunes:summary: After visiting Leila’s father, a bleeding and beaten Stephanos enters the bar. Ser Selwyn, Ash and Cor go to the blacksmith to maintain their gear while Leyla slips off into the woods with Stephanos to tell him one of her deepest secrets.

item.title: Chapter 2 Ep. 3 | Daisy the Cow
item.description: Party split. Ash and Ser Selwyn want to get a boat to see the Old Hag and go and negotiate to hire one. Meanwhile Cor and Leyla go visit Pat to catch him up on the events of New Forlonde. Cor tagged along hoping to spy on Leyla’s sister Cassia.
item.itunes:summary: Party split. Ash and Ser Selwyn want to get a boat to see the Old Hag and go and negotiate to hire one. Meanwhile Cor and Leyla go visit Pat to catch him up on the events of New Forlonde. Cor tagged along hoping to spy on Leyla’s sister Cassia.

item.title: Chapter 2 Ep. 2 | The Most Dangerous Person on the Road
item.description: A half-dead stranger at the bar in the morning turns out to be someone from Ash’s past.
item.itunes:summary: A half-dead stranger at the bar in the morning turns out to be someone from Ash’s past.

item.title: Chapter 2 Ep. 1 | Souped Up
item.description: The players catch up with contacts and friends in Shinrin. Cor gets served what he asked for… soup? The townsfolk have a mixture of excitement and reservation about the arrival of the settlers and the party is in the middle of it all.
item.itunes:summary: The players catch up with contacts and friends in Shinrin. Cor gets served what he asked for… soup? The townsfolk have a mixture of excitement and reservation about the arrival of the settlers and the party is in the middle of it all.

item.title: Chapter 1 Ep. 25 | Warm Welcome
item.description: Rumours are collected, stomped or spread by the party as they come up to Shinrin. Checking in with Ser Thomas they get paid for their mission and head to the bar for a well deserved drink. The whole town is excited to meet the new settlers and form their own opinions of these wealthy outsiders.
item.itunes:summary: Rumours are collected, stomped or spread by the party as they come up to Shinrin. Checking in with Ser Thomas they get paid for their mission and head to the bar for a well deserved drink. The whole town is excited to meet the new settlers and form their own opinions of these wealthy outsiders.

item.title: Chapter 1 Ep. 24 | Road Rage
item.description: Ser Selwyn and the party is given some criticism for how he handled their last few battles. Then on top of this they encounter an old rival on the road who refuses to let them pass.
item.itunes:summary: Ser Selwyn and the party is given some criticism for how he handled their last few battles. Then on top of this they encounter an old rival on the road who refuses to let them pass.

item.title: Chapter 1 Ep. 23 | Silky Nightmares
item.description: A spidery visitor infiltrates the camp at night.
item.itunes:summary: A spidery visitor infiltrates the camp at night.

item.title: Chapter 1 Ep. 22 | Bloody Chitines
item.description: The battle continues and the party is separated and extremely outnumbered. Some new tactics though begin to change the tide of battle.
item.itunes:summary: The battle continues and the party is separated and extremely outnumbered. Some new tactics though begin to change the tide of battle.

item.title: Chapter 1 Ep. 21 | An Ear for an Ear
item.description: A fierce battle ensues. The party and settlers are fighting for their lives as hairy four-armed spidery humanoids descend from the trees above. Restrained by nets of spider webs the party is in their stickiest situation yet.
item.itunes:summary: A fierce battle ensues. The party and settlers are fighting for their lives as hairy four-armed spidery humanoids descend from the trees above. Restrained by nets of spider webs the party is in their stickiest situation yet.

item.title: Chapter 1 Ep. 20 | Tangled
item.description: The party arrives at the Craftsman watch tower and is congratulated on their progress protecting the settlers. All of whom are still alive. But then as they travel on, the path and trees above become more and more coated in thick cobwebs.
item.itunes:summary: The party arrives at the Craftsman watch tower and is congratulated on their progress protecting the settlers. All of whom are still alive. But then as they travel on, the path and trees above become more and more coated in thick cobwebs.

item.title: Chapter 1 Ep. 19 | The Moon Waneth
item.description: Ser Selwyn is put under a curse and his return to the camp crashes the party. Leila, when she finally returns to camp, finds someone she had always overlooked suddenly much more attractive. Ash has his first kiss and a few other firsts too.
item.itunes:summary: Ser Selwyn is put under a curse and his return to the camp crashes the party. Leila, when she finally returns to camp, finds someone she had always overlooked suddenly much more attractive. Ash has his first kiss and a few other firsts too.

item.title: Chapter 1 Ep. 18 | The Moon Riseth
item.description: It is Midsummer’s Eve and the celebration has begun. Ser Selwyn and Leila are magically abducted meanwhile Ash meets some very attractive travelers who have come to enjoy the party.
item.itunes:summary: It is Midsummer’s Eve and the celebration has begun. Ser Selwyn and Leila are magically abducted meanwhile Ash meets some very attractive travelers who have come to enjoy the party.

item.title: Chapter 1 Ep. 17 | Tall Tales
item.description: The party must pay a hefty toll to pass through hostile territory. Or they could fight their way through. Or they could think of something totally unexpected and role-play a new solution.
item.itunes:summary: The party must pay a hefty toll to pass through hostile territory. Or they could fight their way through. Or they could think of something totally unexpected and role-play a new solution.

item.title: Chapter 1 Ep. 16 | Party Plans
item.description: Ser Selwyn pays a quick visit to Club Petal before leaving back for Shinrin with the 20 or so settlers. Cor gets himself promoted and Ash makes some new friends. It’s coming up to Midsummer’s Eve and so the party makes plans to have their own roadside celebration of this ancient festival.
item.itunes:summary: Ser Selwyn pays a quick visit to Club Petal before leaving back for Shinrin with the 20 or so settlers. Cor gets himself promoted and Ash makes some new friends. It’s coming up to Midsummer’s Eve and so the party makes plans to have their own roadside celebration of this ancient festival.

item.title: Chapter 1 Ep. 15 | Bad Romance
item.description: A relaxing night at the bar gets awkward as Leila meets a handsome and flattering noble amongst the settlers going to Shinrin.
item.itunes:summary: A relaxing night at the bar gets awkward as Leila meets a handsome and flattering noble amongst the settlers going to Shinrin.

item.title: Chapter 1 Ep. 14 | Displaced Revenge
item.description: Ash and Cor spread the news of discovering slaves in the hold of the Marietta. Then later, Ser Selwyn is given a mysterious letter inviting him to meet someone on the edge of town.
item.itunes:summary: Ash and Cor spread the news of discovering slaves in the hold of the Marietta. Then later, Ser Selwyn is given a mysterious letter inviting him to meet someone on the edge of town.

item.title: Chapter 1 Ep. 13 | The King, Rebel, and Observer
item.description: The Craftsman of New Forlonde are attacked and it’s the party to the rescue. Or is it? Murders and magic and rooftop chases are all going on while Leila has to weigh her loyalties and choose who dies.
item.itunes:summary: The Craftsman of New Forlonde are attacked and it’s the party to the rescue. Or is it? Murders and magic and rooftop chases are all going on while Leila has to weigh her loyalties and choose who dies.

item.title: Chapter 1 Ep. 12 | Just Distract the Guards
item.description: Cor has a plan to capture his enemy. But the intrigue thickens as his opponent seems to have layers of contingencies in place.
item.itunes:summary: Cor has a plan to capture his enemy. But the intrigue thickens as his opponent seems to have layers of contingencies in place.

item.title: Chapter 1 Ep. 11 | Anyone's Coin is Coin
item.description: Cor and Leila go visit a shady character about a job. But when racial tensions break out can the group still get the job done?
item.itunes:summary: Cor and Leila go visit a shady character about a job. But when racial tensions break out can the group still get the job done?

item.title: Chapter 1 Ep. 10 | Jumping Ship
item.description: Getting an odd job at the docks leads to a troubling investigation for the party.
item.itunes:summary: Getting an odd job at the docks leads to a troubling investigation for the party.

item.title: Chapter 1 Ep. 9 | A Different Kind of Jungle
item.description: Arriving in New Forlonde, the coastal trading and fishing city, the group begins exploring this new urban landscape and discovers it has it’s own types of dangers. Ser Selwyn gets lucky and finds some women who want to talk to him despite his scarred face.
item.itunes:summary: Arriving in New Forlonde, the coastal trading and fishing city, the group begins exploring this new urban landscape and discovers it has it’s own types of dangers. Ser Selwyn gets lucky and finds some women who want to talk to him despite his scarred face.

item.title: Chapter 1 Ep. 8 | Choosing Your Own Path
item.description: Attack! Furious and vicious small humanoids in masks leap from the jungle to attack the party. In the chaos, some of the prisoners make a run for freedom. But after the night’s battle, the party makes it to the seaside town of New Forlonde at last.
item.itunes:summary: Attack! Furious and vicious small humanoids in masks leap from the jungle to attack the party. In the chaos, some of the prisoners make a run for freedom. But after the night’s battle, the party makes it to the seaside town of New Forlonde at last.

item.title: Chapter 1 Ep. 7 | Disciples of The Raven Queen
item.description: The party finds themselves caught in the middle of someone else’s battle. Some humans with terrible fashion sense are being pursued by brightly coloured frog-people. The humans seek refuge with the party while the frog people attack indiscriminately. Cor however near the end of the fight decides to take the humans prisoner and the party then tries to figure out what to do with them.
item.itunes:summary: The party finds themselves caught in the middle of someone else’s battle. Some humans with terrible fashion sense are being pursued by brightly coloured frog-people. The humans seek refuge with the party while the frog people attack indiscriminately. Cor however near the end of the fight decides to take the humans prisoner and the party then tries to figure out what to do with them.

item.title: Chapter 1 Ep. 6 | Scars Are Just Another Kind of Memory
item.description: The party passes near a magical tree bearing glowing Wucca nuts. Excited, the party climbs the tree and disturbs it’s inhabitants. The gold colored drop bears attack viciously and have some bizarre magical qualities. When the party camps to recover near a stream, a strange tri-flowered crawling plant approaches whose scent proves very alluring.
item.itunes:summary: The party passes near a magical tree bearing glowing Wucca nuts. Excited, the party climbs the tree and disturbs it’s inhabitants. The gold colored drop bears attack viciously and have some bizarre magical qualities. When the party camps to recover near a stream, a strange tri-flowered crawling plant approaches whose scent proves very alluring.

item.title: Chapter 1 Ep. 4 | Monkey Business
item.description: Spiders, monkeys and more harass and threaten the party as they make their way through the jungle trail towards the coastal town of New Forlonde. Leila sheds some light on their situation and Ser Selwyn attacks a cabbage. Cor falls unconscious and Ash is just generally a badass 14 year old.
item.itunes:summary: Spiders, monkeys and more harass and threaten the party as they make their way through the jungle trail towards the coastal town of New Forlonde. Leila sheds some light on their situation and Ser Selwyn attacks a cabbage. Cor falls unconscious and Ash is just generally a badass 14 year old.

item.title: Chapter 1 Ep. 3 | The Aftermath
item.description: After the bar fight, Ser Selwyn talks to the guard about what to do with the Blackheart Orcs. Meanwhile Leila’s friends give her some advice on how to politically manage the situation. Ser Selwyn then goes over the details of the plan to retrieve the settlers with his superiors. They rest and rise extra early to depart Shinrin for the wild trails of the jungle.
item.itunes:summary: After the bar fight, Ser Selwyn talks to the guard about what to do with the Blackheart Orcs. Meanwhile Leila’s friends give her some advice on how to politically manage the situation. Ser Selwyn then goes over the details of the plan to retrieve the settlers with his superiors. They rest and rise extra early to depart Shinrin for the wild trails of the jungle.

item.title: Chapter 1 Ep. 2 | Enter the Blackhearts
item.description: Selwyn & Leila take a trip to the Kronus’s farm to try to convince the widow there to let her son join the Craftsmen. Meanwhile Ash takes Cor to a shrine to show him the deities of Shinrin. Cor isn’t much impressed. That evening, Leila’s friends are keen to meet Cor, for some reason, while Ash brags about becoming a Craftsman to the other guards. Their evening is interrupted by a gang of orcs called the Blackhearts looking for a fight.
item.itunes:summary: Selwyn & Leila take a trip to the Kronus’s farm to try to convince the widow there to let her son join the Craftsmen. Meanwhile Ash takes Cor to a shrine to show him the deities of Shinrin. Cor isn’t much impressed. That evening, Leila’s friends are keen to meet Cor, for some reason, while Ash brags about becoming a Craftsman to the other guards. Their evening is interrupted by a gang of orcs called the Blackhearts looking for a fight.

item.title: Chapter 1 Ep. 1 | A Replacement Craftsman
item.description: After their tiger hunting trip, the party spends the evening dining with Lord Jacku and Lady Jiru Shinrin. The next morning they enjoy bacon in the servant’s kitchen before slipping out and splitting up to do town jobs. Ser Selwyn and Leila visit Ser Thomas while Cor and Ash go shopping for supplies with their new-found wealth. They learn about a job escorting new settlers to Shinrin and decide to take it.
item.itunes:summary: After their tiger hunting trip, the party spends the evening dining with Lord Jacku and Lady Jiru Shinrin. The next morning they enjoy bacon in the servant’s kitchen before slipping out and splitting up to do town jobs. Ser Selwyn and Leila visit Ser Thomas while Cor and Ash go shopping for supplies with their new-found wealth. They learn about a job escorting new settlers to Shinrin and decide to take it.

item.title: Intro and Prelude
item.description: We didn’t start this campaign as a podcast. We played for a few weeks and then decided to get a mic, make some posts and record our sessions. This is a special episode of us recapping what everyone did before the podcast’s start. Its a great way to meet the characters, meet the players, and catch up on the story so far.
item.itunes:summary: We didn’t start this campaign as a podcast. We played for a few weeks and then decided to get a mic, make some posts and record our sessions. This is a special episode of us recapping what everyone did before the podcast’s start. Its a great way to meet the characters, meet the players, and catch up on the story so far.
